review: Absolutely love my new sustainable tee! The fabric is incredibly soft and the fit is perfect. It feels great knowing I'm supporting ethical fashion. Highly recommend!
The quality is fantastic, definitely worth the price. My only minor note is that the color was slightly darker than it appeared online, but still a beautiful shade of emerald.
I bought this as a gift, and they adored it! The packaging was also eco-friendly, which was a huge plus. Fast shipping and excellent customer service.
Fantastic durability! I've washed this t-shirt multiple times and it holds its shape and color perfectly. A staple in my conscious closet now.
It's a good shirt, but I found the sizing runs a bit small. I'd suggest ordering one size up if you prefer a looser fit. Otherwise, great materials.
A truly comfortable and breathable shirt. Perfect for all-day wear. It’s hard to find high-quality basics that are also genuinely sustainable, but this brand nails it.
The fabric is amazing, so soft against the skin. I appreciate the transparency about the supply chain. Lost one star because shipping took a little longer than expected.
My favourite shirt! The B-Corp certification really sold me. It’s stylish, comfortable, and aligns with my values. Will be buying more colors soon.
Received my order today and I'm thrilled! The GOTS certification gives me peace of mind. The fit is true to size and the material feels luxurious.
Great product overall. The color selection is excellent. I wish there were more details on the carbon offsetting efforts mentioned, but the shirt itself is top-notch.
